scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run build:process
scripts.build:process: yarn run build:umd-es && yarn run build:es
scripts.build:umd-es: webpack && node build_tmp/scripts.js > build_tmp/shell.sh && sh build_tmp/shell.sh
scripts.build:es: rm build_tmp/scripts.js && cp -r src/index.js src/lib build_tmp && echo 'import "./common.css";' >> build_tmp/index.js && babel build_tmp -d es && cp build_tmp/common.css es/
